synonyms.synonym: Calmodulin-dependent calcineurin A subunit alpha isoform

protein.specific_function: Calcium-dependent, calmodulin-stimulated protein phosphatase. This subunit may have a role in the calmodulin activation of calcineurin. Dephosphorylates DNM1L, HSPB1 and SSH1.

go_class.description: G1/S transition of mitotic cell cycle
positive regulation of transcription from RNA polymerase II promoter
regulation of excitatory postsynaptic membrane potential
transition between fast and slow fiber
